content.paragraph:
My name is Ilyas Kaya and I'm 19 years old, born in Stockholm, Sweden. I'm a first year Fullstack .NET student at Chas Academy, learning how to become a better developer.

In my free time I play video games, watch movies and stay healthy by going to the gym once or twice a week.

My dreams for the future is to work with .NET Development and have some sort of impact to the world.

I have always loved computers and technology as a kid, and my love for programming came to when I was studying Game Development, where I enjoyed writing code more than designing worlds.



- Below are some languages or software I know.
